de.polygonal.ds.Bits

type
class

Helper class for working with bit flags.

Static Variables

ALL(inline,null) : Int

0xFFFFFFFF

BIT_01(inline,null) : Int

1 << 00 (0x00000001)

BIT_02(inline,null) : Int

1 << 01 (0x00000002)

BIT_03(inline,null) : Int

1 << 02 (0x00000004)

BIT_04(inline,null) : Int

1 << 03 (0x00000008)

BIT_05(inline,null) : Int

1 << 04 (0x00000010)

BIT_06(inline,null) : Int

1 << 05 (0x00000020)

BIT_07(inline,null) : Int

1 << 06 (0x00000040)

BIT_08(inline,null) : Int

1 << 07 (0x00000080)

BIT_09(inline,null) : Int

1 << 08 (0x00000100)

BIT_10(inline,null) : Int

1 << 09 (0x00000200)

BIT_11(inline,null) : Int

1 << 10 (0x00000400)

1 << 11 (0x00000800)

1 << 12 (0x00001000)

1 << 13 (0x00002000)

1 << 14 (0x00004000)

1 << 15 (0x00008000)

1 << 16 (0x00010000)

Static Methods

inline clrBitAt(x : Int, i : Int) : Int

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError index out of range (debug only).
Sets the bit in x at index i (LSB 0) to 0.

inline clrBits(x : Int, mask : Int) : Int

Returns x AND ~mask.

inline flipDWORD(x : Int) : Int

Flips the bytes within the DWORD x (4 byte) to convert between little endian and big endian format.

inline flipWORD(x : Int) : Int

Flips the bytes within the WORD x (2 byte) to convert between little endian and big endian format.

inline getBits(x : Int, mask : Int) : Int

Returns x AND mask.

inline hasBitAt(x : Int, i : Int) : Bool

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError index out of range (debug only).
Returns true if the bit in x at index i (LSB 0) is 1.

inline hasBits(x : Int, mask : Int) : Bool

Returns true if x AND mask != 0.

inline incBits(x : Int, mask : Int) : Bool

Returns true if x AND mask == mask (x includes all mask bits).

inline invBitAt(x : Int, i : Int) : Int

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError index out of range (debug only).
Flips the bit in x at index i (LSB 0).

inline invBits(x : Int, mask : Int) : Int

Returns x ^ mask.

inline mask(n : Int) : Int

Constructs a mask of n bits.

inline msb(x : Int) : Int

Returns the most significant bit of x.

inline nlz(x : Int) : Int

Counts the number of leading 0's.
e.g. 16 (0x10 or b10000) has 27 leading 0's.

inline ntz(x : Int) : Int

Counts the number of trailing 0's.
e.g. 16 (0x10 or b10000) has 4 trailing 0's.

inline ones(x : Int) : Int

Counts the number of "1"-bits.
e.g. 00110111 has 5 bits set.

inline packI16(lo : Int, hi : Int) : Int

parameters
lo the short that is stored in the lower 16 bits (LSB 0).
hi the short that is stored in the upper 16 bits.
Packs two signed shorts into a single integer.

inline reverse(x : Int) : Int

Reverses x.
e.g. b111000 becomes b000111.

inline rol(x : Int, n : Int) : Int

Bitwise rotates the integer x by n places to the left.

inline ror(x : Int, n : Int) : Int

Bitwise rotates the integer x by n places to the right.

inline setBitAt(x : Int, i : Int) : Int

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError index out of range (debug only).
Sets the bit in x at index i (LSB 0) to 1.

inline setBits(x : Int, mask : Int) : Int

Returns x OR mask.

inline setBitsIf(x : Int, mask : Int, expr : Bool) : Int

Sets all mask bits in x if expr is true, or clears all mask bits in x if expr is false.

inline setBitsRange(x : Int, min : Int, max : Int) : Int

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError invalid range (debug only).
Sets all bits in x in the range [0, 31].

inline unpackI16Hi(x : Int) : Int

Extracts a signed short from the upper 16 bits (LSB 0).

inline unpackI16Lo(x : Int) : Int

Extracts a signed short from the lower 16 bits (LSB 0).
